name: CommunityHubByParker
0:
”Alexa, launch Community Hub”
”Alexa, open Community Hub”
”Alexa, start Community Hub”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: community hub
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Parker Connected Communities™' Community Hub Skill connects older adults to their senior housing communities by enabling them to access community information by just using just their voice. 

The Community Hub skill allows residents to hear their community’s latest alerts as well as details about future events on the community calendar, empowering residents to discover, register and receive reminders for the events that interest them the most.
